description:
There is a man who can hear the voices of the vinegar he makes. A bird gets its leg stuck in a rice ball. There was a young man who was afraid of nothing.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Osu no Sasayaki / Torinomi Jii-san / Tengu to Sora no Tabi
The Wispering Vinegar / The Old Man Who Swallowed Birds / The Tengu and the Sky Journey
お酢のささやき / 鳥呑み爺さん / 天狗と空の旅
